key_risks: Market concentration risk due to heavy reliance on Sun Belt markets
Interest rate sensitivity impacting borrowing costs and profitability
Regulatory challenges from potential changes in housing laws and rent control measures
High tenant turnover rates and rent collection challenges
Tenant controversies regarding rent increases and property conditions
controversies: Criticism from tenants and advocacy groups over rent increases and property conditions
social_issues: Aggressive rent increases in high-demand markets raising ethical concerns
Tenant complaints about maintenance issues and rent hikes
